EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited: Calgary Flames Vs. Toronto Maple Leafs - 11/28/2017
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<https://turbonomic.com/learn-calgary/> DearÂ {{lead.First Name:default=Friend}},
I am pleased to invite to you an exclusive event on November 28th, for an evening of food, drinks and Flames Hockey!
We are partnering with our friends at Cisco to bring excellent technology, customer service and good times to our friends in Calgary.
I hope you will accept this invitation as you consider becoming part of the Turbonomic family, so that we can get to know our team even better. Calgary Executive Networking Event <[[https://turbonomic.com/learn-calgary/]]> Scotiabank Saddledome: 555 Saddledome Rise SE, Calgary, AB T2G 2W1, Canada Tuesday, November 28th, 7:00pm
We look forward to seeing you there!
Best,
The Turbonomic Team
